item.title: 英国公用事业公司增加污水溢出投资，但泰晤士河水务公司不在此列
item.description: 英国六家自来水公司将斥资总计 1.8 亿英镑（约合 2.31 亿美元）来减少数千次污水泄漏，但泰晤士水务有限公司（Thames Water Ltd. ）并不在其中，它是英国最大的自来水公司，也是最严重的违规者之一。【原文：Six English water companies will spend a total £180 million ($231 million) to cut thousands of sewage spills, but Thames Water Ltd., the largest and one of the worst offenders, isn’t one of them.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 中国居民消费价格自 8 月份以来首次出现上涨。印度与欧洲四国签署自由贸易协定。两名飞行员在驾驶舱睡着后被停职。以下是您今天需要了解的信息。【原文：China’s consumer prices rose for the first time since August. India and four European countries sign free trade pact. Two pilots suspended after both fell asleep in the cockpit. Here’s what you need to know today.】

item.title: 投资者期待美国通胀数据公布，石油止跌回升
item.description: 本周美国将公布通胀数据，欧佩克和国际能源署的报告也可能为需求前景提供线索。【原文：Oil held a loss ahead of US inflation data and reports from OPEC and the IEA this week that may provide clues on the demand outlook.】

item.title: 苹果、汇丰与全球部长共同出席伦敦反欺诈峰会
item.description: 来自 11 个国家的政府部长将与银行家和技术高管一起参加本周在伦敦举行的国际反欺诈峰会。【原文：Government ministers from 11 countries will be joined by bankers and technology executives at an international summit to fight against fraud taking place in London this week.】

item.title: 美国CPI成为焦点，亚洲股市将下跌：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周一开盘表现平淡，因为投资者期待周二公布的美国通胀数据，预计该数据将显示核心物价进一步放缓。【原文：Shares in Asia were primed for a muted open Monday as investors look ahead to US inflation data due Tuesday that is expected to show a further slowing in core prices.】

item.title: 印尼盾在美联储反弹前面临季节性疲软
item.description: 随着全球投资者开始抢购印尼的债券，印尼盾可能会在短期内走软，然后再获得支撑。【原文：Indonesia’s rupiah may be set for near-term weakness before gaining traction as global investors start to snap up the nation’s bonds.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 在日本纪念导致福岛核灾难的大地震和海啸发生 13 周年之际，日本的原子能正在重新崛起。黄金价格一路飙升，创下历史新高。与此同时，Archer-Daniels-Midland 公司将发布因会计调查而推迟发布的第四季度财报。石油勘探者、投资者和分析师将齐聚 S&P Global 的 CERAWeek 会议，这是石油行业最大的全球活动之一。【原文：Japan is seeing a resurgence of atomic power as the country marks the 13th anniversary of the massive earthquake and tsunami that led to the Fukushima nuclear disaster. Gold is on fire, soaring to a fresh record. Meanwhile, Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. is slated to release its fourth-quarter results, which have been delayed amid an accounting probe. Oil explorers, investors and analysts will gather at the CERAWeek by S&P Global conference, one of the industry’s biggest global events.】

item.title: 德国面临铁路和航空员工罢工引发的更多旅行混乱
item.description: 在代表德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）机舱乘务员和火车司机的工会宣布举行更多罢工之后，德国准备迎接新一轮旅行中断浪潮。【原文：Germany braced for another wave of travel disruptions after unions representing Deutsche Lufthansa AG’s cabin crew and train drivers announced more walkouts, adding to a string of travel chaos that hit Europe’s largest economy over the past months.】

item.title: 日本回收新贵试水 SPAC 首次登陆纽交所
item.description: 日本一家小型塑料回收公司正准备本月通过 SPAC 合并的方式在美国上市，尽管许多有希望上市的公司都在推迟或取消此类计划。【原文：A small Japanese plastic recycling company is gearing up to go public in the US through a SPAC merger this month, even as many IPO hopefuls are delaying or scrapping such plans.】

item.title: Reddit 计划首次公开募股，最高筹资 7.48 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Reddit 公司及其投资者正在寻求在今年迄今为止规模最大的首次公开募股中筹集高达 7.48 亿美元的资金。【原文：Reddit Inc. and its investors are seeking to raise as much as $748 million in what would be one of the biggest initial public offerings so far this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 债券交易员关注关键的美国通胀报告以确定下一步赌注
item.description: 本周，美国债券市场将迎来自己的 "超级星期二"：美国将公布新的通胀数据，投资者将据此预测美联储何时开始降息。【原文：This week, the US bond market faces its own Super Tuesday of sorts: the release of fresh inflation data investors will use to predict when the Federal Reserve will start cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 美国敦促 UnitedHealth 在黑客攻击后向医疗服务提供者支付费用
item.description: 拜登政府正在要求联合健康集团公司加快向医疗服务提供商付款，因为最近的一次网络攻击导致其子公司 Change Healthcare 的业务中断数周。【原文：The Biden Administration is asking UnitedHealth Group Inc. to expedite payments to health care providers after a recent cyberattack caused weeks of disruptions to its subsidiary, Change Healthcare.】

item.title: 美国农民在失去顶级农作物出口桂冠后奋起反击
item.description: 在过去十年中，美国失去了世界头号农作物出口国的地位，其农民已准备好反击。策略是：最大限度地提高产量。【原文：After the US lost its status as the world’s top exporter of crops over the past decade, its farmers are ready to fight back. The strategy: maximizing production.】

item.title: 美联储官员释放降息信号日益临近
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）和他的同事们在将利率上调至二十年来的最高点八个月后，正逐步接近于回调他们的通胀斗争。【原文：Eight months after raising interest rates to a two-decade high, Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell and his colleagues are moving closer to dialing back their inflation fight.】

item.title: 交易员警惕通胀超预期升温
item.description: 在一份不及预期的通胀报告震撼股市一个月之后，投资者担心周二的最新数据会重演。【原文：A month after the stock market was rocked by a worse-than-expected inflation report, investors are fearing a reprise when the latest data arrives on Tuesday.】

item.title: 香港周末房产交易量跃升至三年新高
item.description: 根据中原地产代理有限公司（Centaline Property Agency Ltd.）的数据，本周末香港十大屋苑的成交量升至三年来最高。【原文：Hong Kong’s 10 biggest estates saw transaction volume rise to the highest in three years this weekend, according to Centaline Property Agency Ltd.】

item.title: 最高风险债券飙升，新兴市场违约风险消退
item.description: 今年新兴市场政府违约的风险正在减弱，这刺激了不久前还濒临崩溃的债券反弹，并推动垃圾级主权债务创下2019年以来的最佳开局。【原文：The risk of government defaults in emerging markets this year is subsiding, stoking a rally in bonds that were just recently teetering on collapse and propelling junk-rated sovereign debt to its best start to a year since 2019.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织达成协议后，世界银行将向埃及提供 30 亿美元
item.description: 埃及财政部长穆罕默德-马伊特（Mohamed Maait）周日表示，由于北非国家已经获得了国际货币基金组织的扩大计划，世界银行将向埃及提供 30 亿美元的支持。【原文：The World Bank will provide Egypt with $3 billion in support now that the North African nation has secured an expanded International Monetary Fund program, Finance Minister Mohamed Maait said Sunday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚将终止对牙刷和碰碰车征收 "扰民 "关税
item.description: 2020年9月21日星期一，在中国江苏省扬州市的扬州曙光牙刷厂，牙刷放在集装箱里。由于冠状病毒在全球蔓延，出口订单从 3 月份开始急剧下降，这家中国牙刷生产商转向国内市场。在阿里巴巴集团关于中国消费者搜索内容的巨大数据宝库的帮助下，该公司转向生产成为当地热门产品的产品。摄影师：沈奇来/彭博社【原文：Toothbrushes sit in containers at the Yangzhou Shuguang Toothbrush Factory in Yangzhou, Jiangsu Province, China, on Monday, Sept. 21, 2020. As export orders started plummeting in March amid the coronavirus’s global spread, the Chinese toothbrush maker turned to the domestic market. With the help of Alibaba Group’s huge trove of data on what Chinese consumers are searching for, the company shifted to making products that became local hits. Photographer: Qilai Shen/Bloomberg】

item.title: 阿美石油公司股息上调为 PIF 带来 50 亿美元季度意外之财
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金将从其持有的阿美石油公司（Aramco）股份中获得约 50 亿美元的季度股息，此前政府向该基金提供了更多的国有石油公司股份，该基金随后表示将提高股东派息。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is set to earn about $5 billion in quarterly dividend payments from its stake in Aramco, after the government handed it more shares in the state-controlled oil company, which then said it would boost shareholder payouts.】

item.title: 科特迪瓦前总统巴博寻求参加 2025 年大选
item.description: 象牙海岸前总统洛朗-巴博（Laurent Gbagbo）在拒绝承认选举失败引发内战并造成至少3000人死亡或失踪十多年后，可能会在明年再次参加竞选。【原文：Ivory Coast’s ex-President Laurent Gbagbo could again run for office next year, more than a decade after his refusal to concede election defeat sparked a civil war which left at least 3,000 people dead or missing.】

item.title: 两名印度尼西亚飞行员在驾驶舱睡着后被停职
item.description: 印度尼西亚雄狮集团旗下的全服务航空公司巴蒂克航空公司（Batik Air）在一份声明中说，该公司暂时停飞了两名飞行员，因为他们在 1 月底的一次国内航班上在驾驶舱内睡着了。【原文：Batik Air, full-service carrier of Indonesia’s Lion Group, temporarily suspended two pilots after they fell asleep in the cockpit during a domestic flight in late January, the carrier said in a statement.】

item.title: 创纪录的价格令买家望而却步，迪拜金店遭受重创
item.description: 黄金价格不断攀升，使迪拜的传统集市变得更像是橱窗购物。【原文：The ever-higher prices reached by gold are turning Dubai’s traditional bazaar into more of a window-shopping experience.】

item.title: 中东天然气竞争白热化，阿美正在洽谈美国液化天然气项目
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）正在与一些公司洽谈在美国的液化天然气项目，因为在该地区的竞争对手也在扩张液化天然气行业的时候，沙特阿美石油公司正寻求以液化天然气作为全球增长的燃料。【原文：Saudi Aramco is in talks with companies for liquefied natural gas projects in the US as it looks to the fuel for global growth at a time when rivals in the region are also expanding in the sector.】

item.title: 债券投资者排队资助反普京战争
item.description: 债券投资者正在敦促争吵不休的欧盟领导人在国防开支问题上振作起来，并使该集团的万亿欧元债券计划永久化。【原文：Bond investors are urging squabbling European Union leaders to get their act together on defense spending and make the bloc’s trillion-euro bond program permanent.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯正在大力发展体育运动。有用吗？快评
item.description: 随着沙特阿拉伯着眼于后石油时代的未来，这个王国正前所未有地四处撒钱。由沙特实际领导人穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼王储领导的公共投资基金正在对高尔夫和足球等全球体育运动下大注。这股消费热潮让沙特的球迷们无法忽视，也与沙特推动经济多元化、促进旅游业发展以及提高刚刚获得自由的公民的生活质量的努力不谋而合。【原文：As Saudi Arabia looks toward a post-oil future, the kingdom is spreading around its largess as never before. The Public Investment Fund, led by the country’s de facto leader, Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, is making big bets on global sports including golf and football. The spending spree has made Saudi Arabia impossible to ignore for fans and fits with the country’s drive to diversify the economy, promote tourism and enhance the quality of life for citizens who’ve only recently been freed fr】

item.title: 埃及通胀率在货币暴跌前意外飙升
item.description: 2 月份，埃及通货膨胀出人意料地加速，这一趋势可能会在为扭转陷入困境的经济而备受期待的英镑浮动之后继续下去。【原文：Egyptian inflation unexpectedly accelerated in February, in a trend that may continue after a much-anticipated flotation of the pound aimed at turning around the troubled economy.】
